meanings.sent1: The two identical triangles were superposable, fitting perfectly on top of each other.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle pieces were superposable, allowing them to be stacked without altering their arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The superposable socks kept disappearing in the laundry, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts and emotions were superposable, creating a harmonious balance in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The superposable keys made it easy to unlock both doors with the same key.

meanings.definition: Able to be placed on top of something else without changing the relative positions of the parts.
meanings.sent1: The superposable cups stacked neatly in the cupboard, saving space.
meanings.sent2: The superposable layers of the cake remained perfectly aligned even after slicing.
meanings.sent3: The superposable hats on the shelf looked like a tower of headgear.
meanings.sent4: His arguments were superposable, each one supporting the other seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The superposable building blocks allowed for endless creative constructions.
